0.text: Innate: Whenever an enemy champion dies while Lissandra is nearby, she spawns a Frozen Thrall from their corpse. Frozen Thralls are  invulnerable and  untargetable ice spirits that  slow all nearby enemies by 25% and gain  bonus movement speed that increases over their lifespan. They will chase nearby  visible enemies for 4 seconds, prioritizing  champions, after which they shatter to deal 120 − 520 (based on level) (+ 50% AP) magic damage to nearby enemies.
0.html:
Innate: Whenever an enemy champion dies while Lissandra is nearby, she spawns a Frozen Thrall from their corpse.

Frozen Thralls are invulnerable and untargetable ice spirits that slow all nearby enemies by 25% and gain  bonus movement speed that increases over their lifespan. They will chase nearby visible enemies for 4 seconds, prioritizing champions, after which they shatter to deal 120 − 520 (based on level) (+ 50% AP) magic damage to nearby enemies.
markedPassages: invulnerable
untargetable
slow
bonus movement speed
visible
champions
120 − 520 (based on level)

0.text: Active: Lissandra launches a shard of ice in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies hit. The first target hit is  slowed for 1.5 seconds.
0.html: Active: Lissandra launches a shard of ice in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies hit. The first target hit is slowed for 1.5 seconds.
markedPassages: slowed

1.text: If Ice Shard hits an enemy, it will shatter, increasing its width and maximum range.
1.html: If Ice Shard hits an enemy, it will shatter, increasing its width and maximum range.

0.text: Active: Lissandra freezes nearby enemies, dealing magic damage and  rooting them for a duration.
0.html: Active: Lissandra freezes nearby enemies, dealing magic damage and rooting them for a duration.
markedPassages: rooting

0.text: Active: Lissandra sends a claw of ice in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies it passes through, decelerating over 1.25 seconds. Glacial Path can be recast after 0.5 seconds while the claw is active.
0.html: Active: Lissandra sends a claw of ice in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies it passes through, decelerating over 1.25 seconds. Glacial Path can be recast after 0.5 seconds while the claw is active.

1.text: Recast: Lissandra consumes the claw and  blinks to its current location.
1.html: Recast: Lissandra consumes the claw and blinks to its current location.
markedPassages: blinks

0.text: Active: Lissandra can cast Frozen Tomb on herself or a target enemy champion.
0.html: Active: Lissandra can cast Frozen Tomb on herself or a target enemy champion.

1.text: Enemy Cast: Lissandra freezes the target enemy champion,  knocking them down and  stunning them for 1.5 seconds.
1.html: Enemy Cast: Lissandra freezes the target enemy champion, knocking them down and stunning them for 1.5 seconds.
markedPassages: knocking them down
stunning

2.text: Self Cast: Lissandra instantly entombs herself, placing herself in  stasis for 2.5 seconds while  healing herself over the duration, which is increased by 0% − 100% (based on missing health) at time of cast.
2.html: Self Cast: Lissandra instantly entombs herself, placing herself in stasis for 2.5 seconds while healing herself over the duration, which is increased by 0% − 100% (based on missing health) at time of cast.
markedPassages: stasis
healing
0% − 100% (based on missing health)

3.text: Frozen Tomb creates a field of ice that spreads out from the target over 1.5 seconds and covers the surrounding area for 3 seconds, dealing magic damage to enemies and  slowing them for 0.5 seconds, refreshing every 0.25 seconds while they remain.
3.html: Frozen Tomb creates a field of ice that spreads out from the target over 1.5 seconds and covers the surrounding area for 3 seconds, dealing magic damage to enemies and slowing them for 0.5 seconds, refreshing every 0.25 seconds while they remain.
markedPassages: slowing

textContent.text: Innate: Whenever an enemy champion dies while Lissandra is nearby, she spawns a Frozen Thrall from their corpse. Frozen Thralls are  invulnerable and  untargetable ice spirits that  slow all nearby enemies by 25% and gain  bonus movement speed that increases over their lifespan. They will chase nearby  visible enemies for 4 seconds, prioritizing  champions, after which they shatter to deal 120 − 520 (based on level) (+ 50% AP) magic damage to nearby enemies.
